title: Zen Chronoscope-B Watch Face
developerAddress: Room 1303, Shilong Road 569, Xuhui DIstrict, Shanghai
description: How to Use?- First, you need to have an Android Wear watch, and download "Android Wear" application from Google Play, then follow instructions to pair them.- After installed on your Android Device, this watchface will be automatically synchronized to your paired Android Wear watch. - Long tap on your Android Wear watch, select "ZenChronoscopeBlack"
descriptionHTML:
How to Use?
- First, you need to have an Android Wear watch, and download "Android Wear" application from Google Play, then follow instructions to pair them.
- After installed on your Android Device, this watchface will be automatically synchronized to your paired Android Wear watch.
- Long tap on your Android Wear watch, select "ZenChronoscopeBlack"
comments: Beautiful, but lacking. Great looking watch face, but please add a few customisation options. At the very least I'd love to be able to select the smaller peek cards. Also, the ambient mode needs work.
Did not fit moto 360 The date was completely outside the box
recentChanges: 1. Upgrade to support New Google Watchface API.
